title: A tale of twists and turns in Kenyatta’s claims about improving Kenya’s roads
subtitle: Good roads are the backbone of any economy, president Uhuru Kenyatta said. In 2013 he promised to more than double Kenya’s tarmacked road network, but his claimed achievements are difficult to verify.
author: africacheck.org
